thread.section_title: Consumers Plumbing Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Consumers Plumbing | consumersplumbing.com
thread.title: homeowner

author: homeowner
title: homeowner
text:
I have a an older Grohe kitchen faucet which needed replacement parts.
Grohe recommended 4 retailers for parts. I emailed Consumer Plumbing. They responded promptly. Other companies didn't even reply. The parts were no longer available, but I received a reply suggesting compatible parts and suggestion for another part which I didn't know was needed. The order arrived quickly. The faucet now works wonderfully. No spray all over the counter-top.
